entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Is Coronavirus  under control or is Trump lying once again. After talk of Coronavirus situation being bad for his re-election. Wouldn’t it be just like Trump to lie to get ur votes. The thing is, with Trump, who’s lied over 16,500 times since 2016, we can’t Trust him! Vote Dems!
